description: Manages a SDRS protection group resource within FlexibleEngine.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: The description of a protection group. Changing this creates a new group.

DomainId.description: Specifies the ID of an active-active domain. Changing this creates a new group.

DrType.description:
Specifies the deployment model. The default value is migration indicating migration within a VPC.
Changing this creates a new group.

Enable.description: Enable protection or not. It can only be set to true when there's replication pairs within the protection group.

Name.description: The name of a protection group.

SourceAvailabilityZone.description: Specifies the source AZ of a protection group. Changing this creates a new group.

SourceVpcId.description: Specifies the ID of the source VPC. Changing this creates a new group.

TargetAvailabilityZone.description: Specifies the target AZ of a protection group. Changing this creates a new group.
